name: Madshus Nordic Intelligrip Cross-country Skis - Unisex
description: Recreational racers and keen fitness skiers will appreciate the light core and slightly narrower, faster profile. A mohair and nylon skin ensures optimal kick, without needing to spend time waxing the kick zone.Paulownia wood core surrounded by carbon reinforcement for lightness, stiffness, and torsion.P-Tex 2000 Electra sintered racing bases.IntelliGrip® integrated skin provides strong grip and glide.NIS binding plate premounted.
